recipe.title: Vanilla Matcha Caffeinated Smoothie Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ cups ; hot water, mixed with 1½ teaspoons matcha powder, cooled ; (360 mL)

steps.step: Pour the matcha mixture into an ice cube tray. Freeze for at least 4 hours, or overnight.
Add the matcha ice cubes, milk, sugar, and vanilla to a blender. Blend until smooth.
Pour into glasses and top with whipped cream and a pinch of matcha powder.
